DOC.brief_summary: The intervention include biweekly access group fitness class , ( Group 1 ) without ( Group 2 ) weekly nutrition physical activity education session . Outcome measure assess baseline immediately post intervention include BMI , waist circumference , blood pressure , physical activity dietary behavior , psychosocial variable .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Targeting Obesity-related Behaviors
DOC.detailed_description: This 15-week randomized control pilot study consist two group . All participant receive access two group fitness class per week , offer free charge Caswell County Parks Recreation Building . Zumba class offer one night week , even 'potluck night ' design increase participant exposure variety fitness class floor aerobics , kickboxing , line dancing , African dancing . Participants intervention group ( Group 1 ) enrol Eat Smart , Move More , Weigh Less ( ESMMWL ) receive hour weekly education class healthy eat physical activity . The ESMMWL curriculum 15-week weight-management program deliver local educator . Published research data use identify strategy would lead weight loss and/or weight maintenance . The program use Theory Planned Behavior , informs , empowers , motivate participant live mindfully make choice eat physical activity . The program provide opportunity participant keep journal healthy eating physical activity behavior .
DOC.criteria: > 18 year age , Englishspeaking , No selfreported contraindication exercise Eligible participant schedule enrollment appointment . At appointment , participant blood pressure 180/110 direct obtain immediate medical attention eligible enroll upon write consent physician < 18 year age NonEnglishspeaking Selfreported contraindication exercise Blood pressure 180/110 without medical clearance
